faq.title: Clear Answers, Expert Insights, Hassle Free Consulting Experience

items.question: What is escrow account assistance for international trade?
items.answer: Escrow account services are structures set up by a skilled escrow agent with the buyer and seller as joint account holders to secure and expedite the payment and delivery of funds or assets.

items.question: What are the benefits of escrow account assistance?
items.answer: An escrow account agent acts as a neutral third-party to hold your wealth until all conditions are met, empowering you to close deals more confidently.

items.question: Who needs an escrow account in the UAE?
items.answer: An escrow account is ideal for individuals involved in high-value transactions, such as real estate purchases, mergers, and acquisitions, import/export deals, or large service contracts, offering secure fund holding and risk mitigation.

items.question: Can I withdraw my money from an escrow account?
items.answer: You can withdraw money from your escrow account only if all parties involved agree or if the escrow agent believes all conditions are met.

items.question: Who will be the owner of the escrow account?
items.answer: Generally, the owner of an escrow account is the individual who deposits and is referred to as the ‘depositer’ or ‘principal.'
